Package affix.java.project.moneyservice

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • affix.java.project.moneyservice.Configuration
  • public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration for Money Service HQ application. Values should be supplied in a text file using key = value pattern. The values is set to a default value if no key = value pair is supplied in the text file. NB! key = value pair for attributes listed below needs to be supplied for the application to work: - List<String> defining all sites - LOCAL_CURRENCY defining code for the local currency - boxOfCash key = value pair for currency codes that is supported and the amount of the currency

        Returns:

      • parseCurrencyFile

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Currency> parseCurrencyFile​(java.lang.String filename)
        Parse information from Currency Configuration file with all the available currencies read from the system
        Parameters:
        filename - a String holding name of the currency file including path
        Returns:
        temp a Map<String, Currency> with all the available currencies and rates read from file
